Pre-Game Insights: India, with two impressive wins in two games, are high on momentum and confidence.
India has a significant 19-11 lead over Australia in their T20I rivalry.
India is determined to secure their place in the semi-finals by topping Group 1.
India aims to avenge their heartbreak from the 2023 ODI World Cup final.
Australia boasts a winning mentality in ICC white-ball tournaments but has a surprise defeat to Afghanistan.
Australia has a marginal advantage in AUSvIND matchups in ICC white-ball competitions (12-10).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, Gros Islet, St Lucia.
The match is scheduled for Monday, June 24, 2024, at 8 pm IST.
Others: The match is part of the T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8 stage.
The teams are evenly matched in terms of most runs and most wickets in T20Is.
